mapper.insert: insert into gm(school_no, user_no, message, photo) values(#{school.no}, #{sender.no} ,#{message} ,#{photo})
mapper.select: select g.gm_no, g.message, g.photo, g.created_at, g.is_read, u.user_no, u.name, u.nickname, u.photo user_photo, sc.school_no, sc.name school_name, sc.photo school_photo, sc.open_range from gm g inner join users u on g.user_no=u.user_no inner join schools sc where g.gm_no = #{value}

select g.gm_no, g.message, g.photo, g.created_at, g.is_read, u.user_no, u.name, u.nickname, u.photo user_photo, sc.school_no, sc.name school_name, sc.photo school_photo, sc.open_range from gm g inner join users u on g.user_no=u.user_no inner join schools sc on g.school_no=sc.school_no where g.school_no = #{value}

select g.gm_no, g.message, g.photo, g.created_at, g.is_read, u.user_no, u.name, u.nickname, u.photo user_photo, sc.school_no, sc.name school_name, sc.photo school_photo, sc.open_range from gm g inner join schools sc on sc.school_no=g.school_no inner join school_users su on g.school_no=su.school_no inner join users u on su.user_no=u.user_no JOIN ( select max(gm_no) as 'max_no' FROM gm group by school_no ) sq on (g.gm_no = sq.max_no) where su.user_no = #{value}
